data.actual_result: Shows other users from other servers (all users from all servers you're in). https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/178313653177548800/259772475557019648/bug.gif
data.expected_result: Shows only the users in the current server.
data.short_description: Typing "@" shows users from other servers.
data.steps_to_repro: - Goto any server and type "@" - Goto another server and type "@"
